name: Oatmeal
linkName: 7 Instant Pot Essential Recipes you NEED to Know - Perfect for Beginners!
notes: Don't use instant oatmeal or steel cut. Serve with dark brown sugar, coconut cream, raspberries, blueberries, bananas, etc. You might find the clean-up a bit messy. Make sure you clean the lid's pressure valves and anti-block shield for obstruction and empty the condensation container. I fill the liner completely with cold water after emptying the oatmeal for easy cleaning.

instructions.description: water:oatmeal ==> 2:1 (minimum of 1 cup of water for 2 servings)
place oatmeal directly into water (don't stir)
